entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY
ISOLATED SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS THIS EVENING, THEN NUMEROUS SHOWERS AND SCATTERED THUNDERSTORMS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING, THEN MOSTLY CLOUDY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
NOT AS COOL WITH LOWS AROUND 70

MOSTLY CLOUDY
SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S

SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING, THEN A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S

A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
